amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to develop a voluntary registry to collect data on cancer incidence among firefighters.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2242 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2242 proposed by Senator Portman for Senator Alexander. (consideration: CR S2631-2632; text: CR S2631-2632) To require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to develop a voluntary registry to collect data on cancer incidence among firefighters.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2242 proposed by Senator Portman for Senator Alexander.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2242 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
